author: marrs
msg: Before actually leaving the stop() method, makes sure that the background thread running Jetty has actually stopped. Not doing so caused dereferencing of invalid objects (service references, ..).

author: rfeng
msg: Format the osgi.bundles property and exclude the system bundle

author: sebb
msg: - tighten detection of ascii formats; ensure last byte is correct

author: veithen
msg: Fixed an issue with the argLine Surefire option in axis2-saaj.

author: jleroux
msg: In hyperlink and sub-hyperlink elements, replacement of target parameters by parameter sub-elements
